description:
Add .classpath to gitignore

Android eclipse users like to setup a classpath in the project root.

BUG=


Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=154599

messages.text: Or should we check in a .classpath?

lgtm

I do think we should check in a .classpath, but I'm somewhat conflicted if people should create a link to it or just copy it.

I previously was thinking it should be a link, but I found that I want to have some external project dependencies and those are with a specific name and get added to the .classpath which made it somewhat gross.  It would be awesome to have a .classpath inheritance that would allow people to configure options without messing up the defaults.
OK, I'll commit this for now anyway and obviously if/when we have a checked in one it's easy to remove this line again :)

CQ is trying da patch. Follow status at
https://chromium-status.appspot.com/cq/joth@chromium.org/10916037/1

subject: Add .classpath to gitignore
